dcterms:description: A dataset containing 4,440 cooking games generated by the TextWorld framework, where the goal of each game is to prepare a recipe. The games are divided into 222 different types, with varying complexity based on attributes such as the number of ingredients and necessary actions.
dcterms:title: TextWorld Cooking Games

dcterms:description: A dataset of treasure hunting games generated using the TextWorld framework, which requires players to navigate rooms and find specific entities described in quests, with no overlap with cooking games.
dcterms:title: TextWorld Treasure Hunting Games
